name: Ch12BBaseConvo4
_source: speak;Neimi;Oh!|F-finally back on land...|I was starting to worry we'd never get off that boat.
speak;Forde;*yawn*|I don't see what the rush was.|The boat was perfect for catching up on sleep.
speak;Neimi;Y-you were sleeping the whole time?|Even during your watch duty?
speak;Forde;Well, not the whole time.|Just... most of it.|The waves were so soothing.
speak;Neimi;B-but what if something had happened?|What if we were attacked?
speak;Forde;You worry too much, Neimi.|Nothing happened that we couldn't handle, right?|Besides, I sleep with one eye open.
speak;Forde;*yawn*|Now that we're on land, I should find a nice shady tree.|The grass looks perfect for a lengthy nap.
speak;Neimi;Forde!|Absolutely not!|You will not be taking another nap!
speak;Neimi;Do you have any idea how irresponsible you've been?|We all counted on you to keep watch and you were sleeping!|What kind of knight behaves this way?
speak;Neimi;No more excuses!|You're going to take your duties seriously from now on!|No more excessive napping, is that clear?
speak;Forde;Did...did you just raise your voice at me?|I've never seen you like this before.
speak;Neimi;Someone has to set you straight!|You're acting like a child who needs constant supervision!
speak;Forde;Haha!|Is this really the same timid Neimi I know?|You sound exactly like my mother used to!
speak;Neimi;I'm serious, Forde!|I expect you to check all our equipment when we make camp tonight.|And no sleeping until you've finished your patrol!
speak;Forde;You know what?|You'd make a scary, but good mother someday.
speak;Neimi;W-what?|Why would you s-say something like that?
speak;Forde;Just an observation.|Though I pity the poor man who ends up as your husband!|He'll never get to sleep in again!
speak;Forde;I'm going, I'm going!|No need to get angry again!
speak;Neimi;Me...acting like a m-mother?|I didn't realize I could sound so...commanding...
